featuredProjects.title: Skillify
featuredProjects.subtitle: Video Learning Platform
featuredProjects.impact: Premium course platform with lifetime access
featuredProjects.description: A comprehensive video learning platform offering expert-led courses across multiple categories. Features premium HD video quality, downloadable resources, hands-on projects, and shareable certificates. Students can learn at their own pace with lifetime access to all course materials.
